sentences.cn: ...昨日失败的社会主义解决方案。

sentences.en: He told the patient that he had a nostrum.
Some nostrum peddled as a cure for unemployment.
sentences.cn: 鼓吹可解决失业问题的妙策.

trans.tran_cn: 骗人的疗法，有专利权的药品，妙策
trans.tran_en: You can refer to ideas or theories about how something should be done as nostrums, especially when you think they are old-fashioned or wrong in some way
